subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Gilles Simon of France won his first ATP title on American soil, beating Dmitry Tursunov, 6-4, 6-4, at the Indianapolis Tennis Championships. Simon, seeded second and ranked 25th in the world, had not reached an ATP semifinal in the United States before this tournament.
